text.sfcr.title: SuperFancyClouds: Rearchitected
text.sfcr.option.enableFog.@Tooltip: Use fog to transition cloud to view boundary.
text.sfcr.option.enableWeatherDensity.@T: Let the clouds density change with current weather & biome.
text.sfcr.option.enableServer.@Tooltip:
When enabled, your sampler / height / density etc.
will synchronized with server if you connect to
a server which installed SFCR.
Also control whether you sync data to other player
when you're host in LAN game.
text.sfcr.option.syncTime.@Tooltip:
When you're host, How often
the cloud position data will be sync to client.
text.sfcr.option.enableNormalCull.@Toolt:
Cull clouds face that no facing towards you.
Known Issue: slightly delay when player moving.
text.sfcr.option.cullMode.@Tooltip:
Circular - remove face that away from center point of screen
Rectangular - remove face that no appear in screen strictly
text.sfcr.option.cullRadianMultiplier.@T:
If there is no clouds in left & right of your widely screen,
try to increase it.
For better visual, circular angle already multiplier by 2,
and rectangular is increased 0.1.
text.sfcr.option.rebuildInterval.@Toolti:
Control interval of cloud remesh (refresh color & shape).
Bigger interval, better performance, but may leads some visual delay.
text.sfcr.option.debug.@Tooltip:
Output debug string to log.
Do §4NOT§r enable it unless you're tester.
text.sfcr.option.cloudHeight.@Tooltip:
Height of the cloud on the Y-axis. May NOT accurate.
Set leftmost to use vanilla height.
text.sfcr.option.cloudBlockSize.@Tooltip:
Define how big a cloud block is. 
Measure in block.
text.sfcr.option.cloudLayerThickness.@To:
Measure in cloud block.
§4May impact performance if set too high§r
text.sfcr.option.cloudRenderDistance.@To:
Measure in cloud block.
Ignored when "Fit to View" is enabled.
§4May impact performance if set too high§r
text.sfcr.option.cloudRenderDistanceFitT: Cloud Render Distance Fit to View
"Cloud Render Distance" will be ignore when enabled.
text.sfcr.option.sampleSteps.@Tooltip:
Control how many steps that Cloud-Sampler will use.
High value make clouds more realistic,
but will reduce performance (and amount).
text.sfcr.option.enableTerrainDodge.@Too:
Cloud block will no appears in higher mountains
or buildings if enabled.
Reducing cloud block size and increasing refresh rate
can improve detection accuracy.
text.sfcr.option.cloudBright.@Tooltip: Increase cloud bright when night or thunder.
text.sfcr.option.fogAutoDistance.@Toolti:
Fog distance will auto adjust depends on view distance and cloud block size.
"Fog Distance" Value will be ignored.
text.sfcr.option.fogMinDistance.@Tooltip:
The distance from fog to player. Higher and farther.
Will swap each other if bigger than END.
text.sfcr.option.fogMaxDistance.@Tooltip:
The distance from fog to player. Higher and farther.
Will swap each other if smaller than START.
text.sfcr.option.thresholdMultiplier.@To:
Formula: §ethreshold - multiplier * weather * biome§r
When sample bigger than it, clouds will gen.
text.sfcr.option.cloudDensity.@PrefixTex: Cloud Density Settings: Set cloud density in different scenes
text.sfcr.option.weatherPreDetectTime.@T:
When the weather is about to change,
how many seconds in advance to change the cloud.
text.sfcr.option.cloudRefreshSpeed.@Tool: Control speed of cloud normal refresh speed.
text.sfcr.option.weatherRefreshSpeed.@To:
Control the refresh rate of clouds when
weather changes. The faster refresh rate,
the smoother density change.
text.sfcr.option.densityChangingSpeed.@T:
Higher speed will make the density
change incoherently.
text.sfcr.option.enableSmoothChange.@Too:
§4WARNING§r:
Bad visual and high hardware performance impact!!!
This function is abadoned cuz' I can handle translucent display.
More information see in Source.
text.autoconfig.sfcr.option.precipitatio: Biome Density Settings: Set cloud density in different area
text.sfcr.option.isBiomeDensityByChunk.@:
Biome detect use chunks' biome instead of player's current biome.
Can improve accuracy and rationality of cloud gen.
Supported by chunk view distance.
text.sfcr.option.isBiomeDensityUseLoaded:
"Detect From Chunk" needs enabled.
Distant cloud which no chunk beneath it
will try to detect loaded chunk nearby player
instead of use sample data.
Enabled it can smoother cloud near and distant, 
but will make distant flicker due to chunk change.
text.sfcr.option.biomeFilter.@Tooltip:
Biome in this list will not affect cloud density.
Format: §omodid:biomeid§r or §o#modid:biometag§r
text.sfcr.command.sync_fail: [SFCRe] Sync fail! Please check mod version.
